title: Golf-Ryder Cup scores
text:
6:05am IST Golf-Ryder Cup scores 
Oct 2 (Gracenote) - Scores from the Ryder Cup on Saturday in Chaska, Minnesota United States lead Europe 9 1/2 - 6 1/2 Fourballs Match 5 Rory McIlroy/Thomas Pieters (Europe) beat Brooks Koepka/Dustin Johnson (U.S.) 3 and 1 Match 6 J.B.Holmes/Ryan Moore (U.S.) beat Danny Willett/Lee Westwood (Europe) 1 up Match 7 Phil Mickelson/Matt Kuchar (U.S.) beat Martin Kaymer/Sergio Garcia (Europe) 2 and 1 Match 8 Patrick Reed/Jordan Spieth (U.S.) beat Justin Rose/Henrik Stenson (Europe) 2 and 1 Next In Golf News
